body_html:
I posted the command in my previous posts..

Here it is:

bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so
--crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool
--host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain
--cpu=armeabi-v7a

ndk version - r14b.. As suggested I changed it to r12b and running it... It takes a really long time to run...
body_text:

Here it is:
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so
--crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool
--host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain
--cpu=armeabi-v7a
ndk version - r14b.. As suggested I changed it to r12b and running it... It takes a really long time to run...
body:
I posted the command in my previous posts..

Here it is:

bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so 
--crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool 
--host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain 
--cpu=armeabi-v7a

ndk version - r14b.. As suggested I changed it to r12b and running it... It takes a really long time to run...
